entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
